description: Supported development of a Flutter mobile app for personalized nutrition data collection with generative AI
Improved user meal logging efficiency by building multi-meal voice input with modular BLoC architecture
Designed GraphQL schemas and backend functions with AWS Amplify to enable persistent AI chat history

Built a serverless pipeline using AWS Lambda functions for user-specific weekly food aggregation and an OpenAI chat thread to convert Passio nutrition data into Healthy Eating Index categories for calculating diet quality scores
Collaborated on building an AI patent classification pipeline to automate industry labeling for market indices
Tested modifications to Python pipeline to enable batch predictions with Gemini, analyzing performance impact
Manually labeled and verified over 100 patent abstracts to assess model accuracy and validate classification results
Developed a Python Discord bot using Interactions.py and Senja API to create an engaging onboarding experience
Collaborated with the Product Design Lead and CEO of the startup to improve user flows for Gen Z audiences
